start_trivia.name: Start Trivia
start_trivia.description: Starts up a game of trivia in the channel.

stop_trivia.name: Stop Trivia
stop_trivia.description: Stops a running game of trivia.

_4chan.name: 4chan
_4chan.description: Views a specific thread ID or OP number of a board, or the list of boards on 4chan.

next_thread.name: Next Thread
next_thread.description: Gets the next OP on the current board.

next_reply.name: Next Reply
next_reply.description: Gets the next reply on the current thread.

search.name: 4chan Search
search.description: Searchs a specific board for a thread that contains the specified query.

is_it_up.name: Is It Up
is_it_up.description: Checks to see if the web service is accessible from the bot.

pingme.name: Ping Me
pingme.description: Gets the ping time between your client and me.

seen.name: Seen Nick
seen.description: Displays the last time the nick has been seen in the channel.

set_access.name: Set Access
set_access.description: Adds the specified nick to the access list with the specified level.

remove_access.name: Remove Access
remove_access.description: Removes the specified access level from the nick.

list_access.name: List Access Levels
list_access.description: Lists all the users with access on the channel and their level.

get_access.name: Get User Access Level
get_access.description: Displays the current access level of a user.

set_founder.name: Set Founder
set_founder.description: Sets the nick to Owner of the chan.

remove_founder.name: Remove Founder
remove_founder.description: Unsets the nick as Owner of the chan.

add_asop.name: Add Auto-SOP
add_asop.description: Adds the nick to the Auto Super Op List.

remove_asop.name: Remove Auto-SOP
remove_asop.description: Removes the nick from the Auto Super Op List.

set_sop.name: Set SOP
set_sop.description: Sets the nick as Super Op.

remove_sop.name: Remove SOP
remove_sop.description: Removes the nick as Super Op.

add_aop.name: Add Auto-OP
add_aop.description: Adds the nick to the Auto Op List.

remove_aop.name: Remove Auto-OP
remove_aop.description: Removes the nick from the Auto Op List.

set_op.name: Set OP
set_op.description: Sets the nick as an Op.

remove_op.name: Remove OP
remove_op.description: Removes the nick as an Op.

add_ahop.name: Add Auto-HOP
add_ahop.description: Adds the nick to the Auto HOP List.

remove_ahop.name: Remove Auto-HOP
remove_ahop.description: Removes the nick from the Auto HOP List.

add_avoice.name: Add Auto-Voice
add_avoice.description: Adds the nick to the Auto Voice List.

remove_avoice.name: Remove Auto-Voice
remove_avoice.description: Removes the nick from the Auto Voice List.

mode.name: Set Channel Mode
mode.description: Sets or unsets a channel mode.

invite.name: Invite to Channel
invite.description: Invites the specified nick into the channel.

auto_kick.name: Auto Kick a Nick
auto_kick.description: Adds the specified nick to the auto kick list.

auto_ban.name: Auto Ban a Nick
auto_ban.description: Adds the specified nick to the auto ban list.

auto_kickban.name: Auto Kick-Ban a Nick
auto_kickban.description: Adds the specified nick to the auto kick-ban list.

remove_auto_kick.name: Remove Nick's Auto Kick
remove_auto_kick.description: Removess the specified nick to the auto kick list.

remove_auto_ban.name: Remove Nick's Auto Ban
remove_auto_ban.description: Adds the specified nick to the auto ban list.

remove_auto_kickban.name: Remove Nick's Auto Kick-Ban
remove_auto_kickban.description: Adds the specified nick to the auto kick-ban list.

set_hop.name: Set HOP
set_hop.description: Sets the nick as Half Op.

remove_hop.name: Remove HOP
remove_hop.description: Removes the nick as Half Op.

clear_bans.name: Clear all Bans
clear_bans.description: Clears all the bans in the channel.

kickban.name: Kick+Ban a Nick
kickban.description: Bans and then Kicks the specified nick.

timed_ban.name: Timed Ban
timed_ban.description: Bans the specified nick for the amount of time specified.

timed_kickban.name: Timed Kick+Ban
timed_kickban.description: Bans and then Kicks the specified nick for the amount of time specified.

kick.name: Kick a User
kick.description: Kicks the user from the channel.

owner_identify.name: Identify as Owner
owner_identify.description: Identifies you as the Bot's owner.

add_owner.name: Add Owner
add_owner.description: Adds the defined nick as an owner to me.

delete_owner.name: Delete Owner
delete_owner.description: Removes the defined nick from my owners list.

nick.name: Change Nickname
nick.description: Changes my nickname to the one specified.

identify.name: Identify Bot
identify.description: Makes me identify to the server.

join.name: Join Channel
join.description: Tells me to join the defined channel.

part.name: Part Channel
part.description: Tells me to leave the defined channel.

say.name: Say Message
say.description: I will display whatever the message is.

action.name: Action Message
action.description: I will display whatever the message is as an action.

quit.name: Disconnect
quit.description: Tells me to quit the server.

quit_all.name: Disconnect All Servers
quit_all.description: Tells me to quit all the servers I am connected to.

cycle.name: Restart Server
cycle.description: Tells me to restart the server.

cycle_all.name: Restart All Servers
cycle_all.description: Tells me to restart all the servers I am connected to.

add_ignore.name: Add to Ignore List
add_ignore.description: Adds the specified nick to the ignore list and the nick will not be able to use any modules.

remove_ignore.name: Remove from Ignore List
remove_ignore.description: Removes the specified nick from the ignore list.

add_module_ignore.name: Add to Module Ignore List
add_module_ignore.description: Adds the specified nick or channel to the module ignore list and the nick or channel will not be able to use the specified module.

remove_module_ignore.name: Remove from Module Ignore List
remove_module_ignore.description: Removes the specified nick or channel from the module ignore list.

add_command_ignore.name: Add to Command Ignore List
add_command_ignore.description: Adds the specified nick or channel to the command ignore list and the nick or channel will not be able to use the specified command.

remove_command_ignore.name: Remove from Command Ignore List
remove_command_ignore.description: Removes the specified nick or channel from the command ignore list.

add_chan_blacklist.name: Add to Channel Blacklist
add_chan_blacklist.description: Adds the specified channel to the blacklist and the bot will not join that channel.

remove_chan_blacklist.name: Remove from Channel Blacklist
remove_chan_blacklist.description: Removes the specified channel from the blacklist.

update_conf.name: Update Configuration
update_conf.description: Updates the Modules and Configurations on all the server sessions.

load_module.name: Load Module
load_module.description: Loads the specified Module into the bot.

unload_module.name: Unload Module
unload_module.description: Unloads the specified Module from the bot.

add_channel.name: Invite to Channel
add_channel.description: Lets any user invite me to their channel.

add_channel_list.name: Add Channel to Auto-Join
add_channel_list.description: Allows the owner to add a channel to the auto-join list.

remove_channel_list.name: Remove Channel from Auto-Join
remove_channel_list.description: Allows the owner to remove a channel to the auto-join list.

list_nicks.name: List Nicks
list_nicks.description: Displays the nicks in the channel.

list_channels.name: List Channels
list_channels.description: Displays the channels I am in.

list_servers.name: List Servers
list_servers.description: Displays the servers I am in.

list_conf.name: List Configuration
list_conf.description: Displays the different values for my current configuration.

display_cpu_ram.name: CPU and RAM Usage
display_cpu_ram.description: Displays the current CPU and RAM usage on the machine.

clear_chan.name: Clear Channel
clear_chan.description: Kicks everyone from the channel except initiator and the bot.

help.name: Help
help.description: Displays the modules available to you. View the module to see it's commands you can use.

remove_rule.name: Remove Channel Rule
remove_rule.description: Removes the specified rule number from the rules list.

add_rule.name: Add Channel Rule
add_rule.description: Adds the specified rule to the end of the channel rules list.

send_message.name: Send a Message
send_message.description: Leaves a message for the specified nick. Will be delivered once the nick joins or speaks in a channel i'm in.

send_anon_message.name: Anonymous Message
send_anon_message.description: Leaves a message for the specified nick without displaying the sender's nick. Will be delivered once the nick joins or speaks in a channel i'm in.

set_intro.name: Set your Introduction
set_intro.description: Adds a personal greeting for whenever you enter the channel. You can add multiple greetings by using | in between each greeting.

quote.name: Channel Quote
quote.description: Gets a random quote from the channel. If a nickname is specified, it will get a quote from that nickname.

weather.name: Get Current Weather
weather.description: Displays the current weather conditions for the city you search for.

forecast.name: Get Weather Forecast
forecast.description: Displays the weather forecast for the city you search for.

google.name: Google Search
google.description: Returns the first result from Google.

hbomb.name: Initiate the H-Bomb
hbomb.description: Initiates a new game of pass the Hbomb.

pass.name: Pass the H-Bomb
pass.description: Passes the H-Bomb to the specified nick.

lock.name: Lock the H-Bomb
lock.description: Locks the bomb to the current holder, or passes it and then locks it.

unlock.name: Unlock the H-Bomb
unlock.description: Unlocks the bomb from the current holder.

set.name: Set bomb holder
set.description: Sets the bomb holder to the specified nick.

stop.name: Stop the Bomb
stop.description: Stops the bomb without it blowing up.

defuse.name: Defuse the H-Bomb
defuse.description: Cuts a wire of the H-Bomb. If you get it correct, the person who passed it to you gets bombed, otherwise you do.

love.name: Send Love
love.description: Sends some love to the nick or yourself.

hug.name: Hug
hug.description: Sends a hug to the nick or yourself.

add_response.name: Add Response
add_response.description: Adds a new response to the dictionary.

delete_response.name: Delete Response
delete_response.description: Removes the specified response from the dictionary.

list_responses.name: List Responses
list_responses.description: Lists all of the responses in the dictionary.

stop.name: Stop Chatting
stop.description: Stops the bot from chatting to you.

create.name: Create Poll
create.description: Creates a poll in the channel.

add_answer.name: Add Answer
add_answer.description: Adds an answer to the active poll.

stop.name: Stop Poll
stop.description: Stops the active poll and displays the results.

display_results.name: Display Results
display_results.description: Displays the results of the current poll.

rollcall.name: Roll Call
rollcall.description: Has me say everyone's nick in the channel for a roll call.

roll_call_message.value: It's time for a Roll Call
roll_call_message.label: Roll Call Message

version.name: Get Version
version.description: Sends a Version request and displays the response.

idle.name: Go Idle
idle.description: Sets you as idle. Will protect you from certain games and actions.

roll.name: Roll Dice
roll.description: Rolls a specified number of dice with certain amount of sides and displays the results.

wolfram_alpha.name: Wolfram Alpha
wolfram_alpha.description: Returns the results of your query from Wolfram Alpha.

about.name: About
about.description: Displays the bots current version, creator, and owners.

source.name: Source Code
source.description: Displays the url for the source code of IRCBot.

uptime.name: Uptime
uptime.description: Displays how long I have been online on this server.

runtime.name: Runtime
runtime.description: Displays how long I have been running.

last.name: Get Command Usage
last.description: Displays the last nickname who used that command, or when a nick last used a command.

set_alarm.name: Set Alarm
set_alarm.description: Sets an alarm for the time specified.

start.name: Start Survey
start.description: Starts a survey session for you via query.

list.name: List Surveys
list.description: Lists all the surveys available to you, the nicks who have completed the survey, or the answers from the specified nick about that survey.

next.name: Next Question
next.description: Submits your entered text as an answer and displays the next question.

add.name: Add Survey
add.description: Begins to add a new survey to the survey list.

finish.name: Finish Survey
finish.description: Finalizes the submitted survey and adds it to the list.

cancel.name: Cancel Survey
cancel.description: Cancels the current survey and erases your answers. Or if you are adding a survey, it will delete all your entered questions.

add_owner.name: Add Survey Owner
add_owner.description: Adds an owner to the specified survey. Multiple owners can be added by comma separating them.

delete_owner.name: Delete Survey Owner
delete_owner.description: Deletes an owner to the specified survey. Multiple owners can be deleted by comma separating them.
